name: Rainy Day Rabbit Holes: Pacific Northwest History and Humor

episodes.title: Sin in the Sanctuary: Religious Sexy Time in Normandy Park
episodes.description: When does a religious group become a cult? In this episode, we venture into the scandalous world of the Community Chapel and Bible Training Center, nestled in the quiet community of Normandy Park, Washington (Shea's former home). This Pentecostal religious group had a dark underbelly of secrets and peculiar sexual practices, prompting speculation of cult-like tendencies veiled behind the guise of spirituality. This story of lust and faith in the Pacific Northwest has it all-money, sex, demons, ugly carpet-even murder. Visit www.rainydayrabbitholes.com for all of the pictures of inside Pastor Barnett's marvelous home. We now have merch !! T-shirts, sweatshirts, hats and totes! Do you want to submit a design for merch? Send it to shea@rainydayrabbitholes.com Follow the Audibly Haunted Podcas t on Spotify or wherever you get podcasts! --- Send in a voice message: https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/rainy-day-rabbit-holes/message
subjects: Community Chapel and Bible Training Center
